LanguageData.Build_HMC_Gun_SVD.label: Build SVD Sniper Rifle
LanguageData.Build_HMC_Gun_SVD.description: Builds an ancient sniper rifle. Semi-automatic, long range, great accuracy and power.\nCaliber: 7.62x54mm R
LanguageData.BuildVintorezRifle.label: Build Vintorez Rifle
